input.sentences: so many contestants were getting ready for the decathlon this year .
my friend was participating in the decathlon and we can see him among the participants here .
i took a clear picture of my friend during the second part of the decathlon .
the race was so long and this was the finish line .
here i am with my friend after the finish line | i was really proud of him .
output.sentences: Many people gathered for the marathon.
Everyone had their caps on to swim.
It was one man who biked his way towards the finish line.
As the man finished the marathon he felt elated.
A celebration was to be had with a fellow friend.
